Articles.Content:
Hello forum, I m hanging for some time around there, but never introduced yourself. I'm playing KSP for quite a long time, but I still haven't been everywhere yet. That need change... 

That's why I started my new project, where I want do a Grand Tour with my craft. I've been playing with my friends via DarkMultiplayer, but now they're quite offline. So I want ask you, if somebody have interest in doing grand tour with me via DMP.

I'm interested into space technologies and history too and looking forward into new things discovered up there.

Anyway, KSP is great game and one of games I still play (other is forgotten after some hours of playing :D) and forum comunity is nice too!

Ave!

Toonu 

 

PS: I can play with new players too and teach them.

 

Edited July 6, 2016 by Toonu

Hello Toonu and welcome to the forums!

I've never used DMP myself, but I wish you good luck finding somebody with whom to do your grand tour.

Happy landings!
Thanks! I wish find someone too...  If you want, you can try DMP with me!
Hey Toonu, Welcome to the forum!

19 hours ago, Toonu said:

Thanks! I wish find someone too...  If you want, you can try DMP with me!  

Thanks, but I'm afraid I'll have to decline.  I have limited KSP time atm and when I do play I'm continuing my rescue-focused career game.  There are lots of folks around here.  If you stick around I'm sure you'll find another player who is interested.

Happy landings!
